data.title: Welcome to CMC—Manchester NH—Hospital & Treatment Centers
data.meta_description: Catholic Medical Center is a renowned Southern NH hospital, Urgent Care and Treatment Center.
data.text:
top 100 Hospitals and Health Systems with

Great Heart Programs

We’re thrilled to be included in Becker's Hospital Review's 2024 list of the top 100 ‘Hospitals and Health Systems with Great Heart Programs’. CMC is the only hospital in NH to be recognized on the list, underscoring our commitment to providing the highest-quality, patient-centered cardiac care. Congratulations to our New England Heart & Vascular Institute team, as well as all the supporting teams and departments involved in the care of our heart patients, on this prestigious recognition that places CMC among the leading heart programs in the nation.

Learn more

Don't Miss

this moment

Are you overdue for your mammogram or colonoscopy?

Regular screenings save lives and are vital for early detection and prevention. Don’t dread it, schedule it—stay proactive about your health by scheduling your appointment today. Contact your primary care provider or contact us:

from cardiac arrest to a

vibrant life

"Dr. Capodilupo is a lifesaver. He cares so much about people. He gives me his 100% undivided attention and is totally focused on me when he sees me for an appointment," shares heart attack patient Larry Gammon. Larry recently shared his incredible survival story and his gratitude for returning to an active life.

Read more

U.S. News & World Report

High-performing Ranking

CMC is recognized as high-performing in five procedures and conditions by U.S. News & World Report, including: heart bypass surgery, congestive heart failure, heart attack, stroke and prostate cancer surgery. Please join us in congratulating our team on this achievement!

primary care that fits

your family, your life

Whether you’re near Bedford, Goffstown, Hooksett or Manchester, we’ve got convenient Primary Care locations near you! CMC Primary Care is welcoming new patients and with just one call to our Access Line we’ll help you find the perfect primary care provider. We’re here to to help care for your family and support you at every stage of life.

5-Star Quality Rating

Why this matters to you

Just like checking reviews before booking a hotel or restaurant, understanding a hospital's star ratings helps you make informed decisions about your healthcare choices. CMS annually assigns star ratings to hospitals nationwide based on their performance across five quality categories. Our 5-Star rating is all about our commitment to quality care and our patient's outcomes.

unless otherwise posted

Masks Optional

Due to changes in transmission levels, it may be necessary to require masks on some units, locations, or throughout CMC. Please understand and respect our role to keep our patients, visitors and staff safe.
